sentence: "After months and months of Brian Kemp having exclusive ability to raise unlimited funds as a result of the bill he signed, Kemp will no longer be able to raise these funds while Stacey Abrams and One Georgia are denied equal ability to operate under the same rules."
author: Bradford Betz
title: Georgia gov: Federal judge orders special committee to stop raising funds for Kemp

sentence: "After months and months of Brian Kemp having exclusive ability to raise unlimited funds as a result of the bill he signed, Kemp will no longer be able to raise these funds while Stacey Abrams and [her leadership committee] One Georgia are denied equal ability to operate under the same rules.

title: Brian Kemp's campaign fundraising suspended until after GOP primary, judge rules

title: Brian Kemp's campaign fundraising suspended until after GOP primary, judge rules

sentence: "After months and months of Brian Kemp having exclusive ability to raise unlimited funds as a result of the bill he signed, Kemp will no longer be able to raise these funds while Stacey Abrams and One Georgia are denied equal ability to operate under the same rules," Abrams campaign manager Lauren Groh-Wargo said in a statement to the Associated Press.
author: Aila Slisco
title: Win for Abrams as Judge Orders Georgia Gov. Kemp PAC to Stop Raising Money
